sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Patch-&patch-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: as, ld diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, install, mv, rm gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc glibc: getconf grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: echo, expr, hostname, uname textutils: cat, tr
